info.title: API Classic Project
info.description: API for communication with the Classic Project

get.summary: Retrieve all video's for this course
get.description: This endpoint returns all the video's

post.description: This endpoint allows a user to add a new video

201.description: the id of the created video

get.summary: Retrieve video for given id
get.description: This endpoint returns all the information for a video

parameters.name: videoId
parameters.description: Id of the video to fetch

patch.description: This endpoint patches some data for this video

parameters.name: videoId
parameters.description: Id of the video to patch

delete.description: This endpoint removes the video from the system

parameters.name: videoId
parameters.description: Id of the video to delete

get.summary: Retrieve all course notes for this course
get.description: This endpoint returns all the course notes

post.description: This endpoint allows a user to add a new course notes

201.description: the id of the created course notes

get.summary: Retrieve courseNotes for given id
get.description: This endpoint returns all the information for course notes

parameters.name: courseNotesId
parameters.description: Id of the course notes to fetch

patch.description: This endpoint patches some data for these course notes

parameters.name: courseNotesId
parameters.description: Id of the course notes to patch

delete.description: This endpoint removes these course notes from the system

parameters.name: courseNotesId
parameters.description: Id of the course notes to delete

get.summary: Retrieve all the comments of the video with the given id
get.description: This endpoint returns all the comment for a video

parameters.name: videoId
parameters.description: Id of the video to fetch

200.description: a comment containing a self reference for the video with given videoId

post.summary: add a new comment to a video
post.description: This endpoint allows a user to add a comment to a video

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: comment to add to the video

201.description: the id of the created comment

get.summary: Retrieve the comment corresponding to the given id
get.description: This endpoint returns a specific comment

parameters.name: videoId
parameters.description: Id of the video to fetch

200.description: a comment containing a self reference for the video with given videoId

patch.description: This endpoint patches some data for this comment

parameters.name: videoId
parameters.description: Id of the video to fetch

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: updated comment to add to the video

delete.description: This endpoint removes the comment from the system

parameters.name: videoId
parameters.description: Id of the video to fetch

get.summary: Retrieve all the video references for the given commentId
get.description: This endpoint returns all the video references for a comment

post.description: This endpoint allows a user to add videoreferences to a comment in a video

parameters.name: videorefs
parameters.description: video references to add to the video

patch.description: This endpoint patches some data for this comment

delete.description: This endpoint removes the video reference from the system

get.summary: Retrieve all the comments of the course notes with the given id
get.description: This endpoint returns all the comment for course notes

parameters.name: courseNotesId
parameters.description: Id of the course notes to fetch

200.description: An comment containing a self reference for the course notes with given courseNotesId

post.summary: add a new comment to course notes
post.description: This endpoint allows a user to add a comment to course notes

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: comment to add to the course notes

201.description: the id of the created comment

get.summary: Retrieve the comment corresponding to the given id
get.description: This endpoint returns a specific comment

parameters.name: courseNotesId
parameters.description: Id of the course notes to fetch

200.description: An comment containing a self reference for the course notes with given courseNotesId

patch.description: This endpoint patches some data for this comment

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: updated comment to add to the course notes

delete.description: This endpoint removes the comment from the system

get.summary: Retrieve all the course notes references for the given commentId
get.description: This endpoint returns all the course notes references for a comment

200.description: A list of course notes references

post.summary: add course notes references to a comment
post.description: This endpoint allows a user to add course notes references to a comment in course notes

parameters.name: courseNotesrefs
parameters.description: courseNotes references to add to the course notes

patch.description: This endpoint patches some data for this reference

parameters.name: courseNotesRefId
parameters.description: Id of the course notes reference

delete.summary: Remove this course notes reference entirely
delete.description: This endpoint removes the course notes reference from the system

parameters.name: courseNotesRefId
parameters.description: Id of the course notes reference

get.summary: Retrieve all the course notes references for the given replyId
get.description: This endpoint returns all the course notes references for a reply

200.description: A list of course notes references

post.summary: add course notes references to a reply
post.description: This endpoint allows a user to add course notes references to a reply in course notes

parameters.name: courseNotesrefs
parameters.description: courseNotes references to add to the course notes

patch.description: This endpoint patches some data for this reference

parameters.name: courseNotesRefId
parameters.description: Id of the course notes reference

delete.summary: Remove this course notes reference entirely
delete.description: This endpoint removes the course notes reference from the system

parameters.name: courseNotesRefId
parameters.description: Id of the course notes reference

get.summary: Retrieve all the video references for the given replyId
get.description: This endpoint returns all the video references for a reply

post.description: This endpoint allows a user to add videoreferences to a reply in a video

parameters.name: videorefs
parameters.description: video references to add to the video

patch.description: This endpoint patches some data for this reply

delete.description: This endpoint removes the video reference from the system

post.summary: add a new reply to a comment
post.description: This endpoint allows a user to add a reply to a comment

parameters.name: reply
parameters.description: reply to add to the vcomment

201.description: the id of the created reply

patch.description: This endpoint patches some data for this reply

delete.description: This endpoint removes the reply from the system

post.summary: add a new reply to an existing reply
post.description: This endpoint allows a user to add a reply to an existing reply

parameters.name: reply
parameters.description: new reply to add to the existing reply

201.description: the id of the created reply

get.summary: Retrieve all the courses
Retrieve specific courses
Retrieve all the lectures
Retrieve specific
Retrieve the pdf with added comments
Retrieve all the users
Retrieve a user

200.description: The session id for the authenticated user

get.summary: Check user and role in current session

duration.description: Length of the video expressed in seconds

numberOfPages.description: Number of pages these course notes contain

username.description: Name of the user that made the comment

creationTime.description: Creation time expressed along the ISO 8601 standard

selfVideoReferences.description: List of references to the current video

selfCourseNotesReferences.description: List of references to the current course notes

question.description: True if this comment is a question

replies.description: List of replies to this comment

approved.description: True if this comment is approved

username.description: Name of the user that made the comment

creationTime.description: Creation time expressed in seconds since 1970

replies.description: List of replies to this comment

approved.description: True if this reply is approved

courseId.description: The id of the course containing the video

lectureId.description: The id of the lecture containing the video

videoId.description: The id of the video this object is referencing to

timestamp.description: The time expressed in seconds corresponding to were the comment is in the video

courseId.description: The id of the course containing the courseNotes

lectureId.description: The id of the lecture containing the courseNotes

courseNotesId.description: The id of the course notes this object is referencing to

locations.description: List of locations where the reference is located in the course notes

pageNumber.description: The page corresponding to were the comment is in the coursenotes

x1.description: coordinate x of upper left corner of the rectangle

y1.description: coordinate y of upper left corner of the rectangle

x2.description: coordinate x of lower right corner of the rectangle

y2.description: coordinate y of lower right corner of the rectangle
